description: Defines data structures, constants, and functions for managing canonical course data, including course modules, course details, and utility functions for retrieving and transforming course data within an educational platform.

methods.name: toLearnerModules
methods.description: Transforms canonical modules into learner-facing module format, including content items, quizzes, and assignments.

methods.name: getCoursesForInstructor
methods.description: Returns a list of courses sorted by last updated date for instructor view.

methods.name: getInitialCanonicalCourses
methods.description: Provides a deep copy of the initial canonical courses data for store hydration.

methods.name: getPublishedCoursesForPath
methods.description: Filters and returns published courses matching a specific path slug.

methods.name: getCourseById
methods.description: Finds and returns a course by its unique ID.

methods.name: getAvailableAssessments
methods.description: Returns a list of available assessments (quizzes and assignments).
